snippet.title: Lying Souls™  - Prologue Preview Gameplay
snippet.description:
Lying Souls™  - Prologue Preview Gameplay

Lying Souls™ is an atmospheric, mysterious single player story horror game. You'll dive into a story in which nothing is as it seems. Find out the reasons behind what happened to your family back then. Your decisions will guide the course of the story.

Coming when it's ready.

Wishlist it on Steam!
Lying Souls: https://store.steampowered.com/app/15...

Learn more on https://www.troxystudios.com

Follow us:
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/StudiosTroxy
Discord: https://discord.gg/BsCR2Jxqfa
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/troxystudios/

LYING SOULS™ © 2022 TROXY STUDIOS ALL RIGHTS RESERVED
